en: Shift your weight evenly between both feet.

en: Take a moment to observe the rhythm of your breath.
Pay attention to how your body feels as you breathe. Notice the rise and fall of your chest, the sensation of air passing through your nose, and the feeling of relaxation spreading through you.
Allow your breath to return to its normal rhythm. Sit quietly for a moment, noticing how you feel.
When you’re ready, gently open your eyes or shift your attention back to your surroundings.
